Mages of Mystralia
Developer(s)
 Borealys Games
Publisher(s)
 Borealys Games
Platform(s)
 PC, PS4, XBOX ONE, Switch
Release date(s)
 18 May 2017
Genre(s)
 Adventure, Fantasy, Magic
Mode(s)
 Single-player
Rating(s)
 ESRB - Everyone 10+
System requirements
Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

OS: Windows 7 64-bit
Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or equivalent
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti or equivalent
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 8 GB available space

Recommended:

OS: Windows 7+ 64-bit
Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 8 GB available space

Mastery File:Mastery Rune.png
Location
 Sky Temple
Type
 Behavior
Mana Cost Multiplier[1]
 +200%
Description
 Adds an elemental effect to the spell.Igni: Adds a chance of causing a burning effectAura: Adds a chance of causing a chain attackAqua: Adds a chance of freezing the targetGaea: Adds a knockback effectUseable with any spell focus.

Move File:Move Rune.png
Location
 Mystral Woods
Type
 Behavior
Mana Cost Multiplier[1]
 +100%
Description
 Adds a movement behavior to the spell.Useable with ACTUS, CREO and EGO.

Overcharge File:Overcharge Rune.png
Location
 Mystral Woods
Type
 Behavior
Mana Cost Multiplier[1]
 +200%
Description
 Allows to hold down the spell, consuming more mana and charging the spell. A fully charged spell deals much more damage.

Periodic File:Periodic Rune.png
Location
 Lava Grotto
Type
 Trigger
Mana Cost Multiplier[1]
 +150%
Description
 Periodically casts a trigger while the spell is active.

Proximity File:Proximity Rune.png
Location
 Haven
Type
 Trigger
Mana Cost Multiplier[1]
 +150%
Description
 Automatically triggers a nested spell when an enemy is near this spell.

Push File:Push Rune.png
Location
 Grayleaf Hamlet
Type
 Behavior
Mana Cost Multiplier[1]
 +75%
Description
 Pushes back objects and enemies hit by the spell.

 Behavior

 +200%
